text: The Cook, the Thief, His Wife & Her Lover is a 1989 British independent movie starring Richard Bohringer, Alan Howard, Michael Gambon and Helen Mirren and directed by Peter Greenaway. This movie was originally tagged by the MPAA under an X rating, due to which commercial distribution of this movie was limited. The X rating was then surrendered, and this movie was released with no rating. It was later released onto video with two versions, one rated NC-17, and the other under an R rating. == Other websites == * Category:1989 crime drama movies Category:1989 romantic drama movies Category:Adultery in movies Category:British crime drama movies Category:British romantic drama movies Category:1980s English-language movies Category:NC-17 rated movies Category:French crime movies Category:French romance movies Category:French drama movies Category:Dutch romance movies Category:Dutch drama movies Category:Movies directed by Peter Greenaway Category:1989 independent movies
title: The Cook, the Thief, His Wife & Her Lover
